title: Price Range per Category
description: Write a query to show the minimum price, maximum price, and average price for each product category. Display category, min_price, max_price, and avg_price.
hint: Use GROUP BY with MIN(), MAX(), and AVG().
solution: SELECT category, MIN(price) as min_price, MAX(price) as max_price, AVG(price) as avg_price FROM products GROUP BY category
